definition: Heaven knows!
day/sky/heaven
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: and in the long run, who knows how it's going to affect you.
sentences.chinese: 而且天曉得日後會有什麼後果。

sentences.english: Had a gust of wind come and taken the note and carried it away to God knows where?
sentences.chinese: 難道是刮來一陣風把紙條刮到只有天曉得的地方去了？

sentences.english: Heaven only knows what a mere Oxford theology degree will be worth by the time she graduates.
sentences.chinese: 天曉得等她畢業時，牛津神學學位有什麼價值。
各位可找來看看，天曉得它在談什麼？

sentences.english: God knew what he went through in prison.
sentences.chinese: 天曉得他在監獄裏都經受了什麼。

definition: unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
red in the face/extremely angry
reckless/extremely daring
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
stupid and ignorant (idiom)
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
sullen/to scowl miserably
false alarm/panic rumor/CL:場|场[chang2]
to play deaf-mute
the guilty party files the suit/the thief cries thief
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
to hoodwink/to deceive/to dupe sb
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
to force someone to do something
bird's nest
